title: coriander_planting_with_puppy
summary: Planting coriander during late morning under warm sunlight, with a young puppy present.
description: Coriander planting activity conducted during late morning when sunlight is warm and suitable for soil work. A young puppy accompanies the activity in the garden area, reflecting integrated daily farm life involving crops and animals.
